observation: Rocky Point Real Estate | Robin Miller  MX Cell, Dial: 011526381090443 US (602) 539-3124 robin@mexicanbeachbum.com Menu Home Search Property Search Featured Properties Daily Listing Alerts Client Login Sandy Beach Resorts Bella Vista Casa Blanca Costa Diamante Diamond Village Esmeralda Las Gaviotas Las Palmas Pinacate Puerta Privada All Listings My Blog Mexico Lenders Contact About Me Email Alerts Testimonials Rentals Castaways Rocky Point Casago Mexico Insurance ESPAÑOL Mexican Beach Bum What's My Home Worth? Start Your Home Search Search Now Featured Listings Beds: 3 Baths: 0 | 1 SqFt: 1294 M7 L4 FR4 Lago de Los Osos Nueva Aurora, Puerto Penasco, SO $159,000 View Listing SqFt: 313 201 1 de Junio, Old Port, Puerto Penasco, SO $129,900 Featured Communities Puerto Penasco, SO Sonoran Spa, SO Sonoran Resorts Beach Front, SO Las Conchas Sandy Beach Rocky Point, SO Rocky Point Real Estate Robin Miller, your Rocky Point Real Estate Broker can help you find your perfect home. Learn about Rocky Point neighborhoods, Rocky Point suburbs, and the best places to live in Rocky Point. Please check out my free, up to date and current Real Estate search that will allow you to search just like an agent. There are many places out there to search, make sure to find a place that offers current listings like my website. All the data is fed directly from the MLS. I have many connections in Rocky Point. Please call or email and ask me any questions you might have. This process is all about you and your needs. Real Estate is a big investment and I understand that. One thing you will get with me is a personal relationship. Robin Miller Your referral is the best compliment I can earn! I recommend Robin as probably the best Realtor in the Puerto Penasco and Puerto Vallarta, Mexico area. She knows the areas and knows the products. She also reads her clients very well to determine their needs and resources without giving the appearance of trying to "sell" them. ...Read More Robin was a great person to work with. Has knowledge, is consistent and a very hard worker, very creative person and has great computer skills. Robin is a very dedicated professional and in her role as Broker-Manager helped to advance her brokerage operations with respect to AMPI rules and regulations and the use of the MLS by her agents and assistants. I agree to be contacted by Mexican Beach Homes via call, email, and text. To opt-out, you can reply 'stop' at any time or click the unsubscribe link in the emails. Message and data rates may apply. The term “multiple listing service” refers to the system used by real estate agents to compensate other brokers and to accumulate and share information about properties with each other. Equal Opportunity Housing refers to the idea that all persons should be granted “equal opportunities” when it comes to renting or purchasing real property. This is usually in reference to anti-discrimination policies and laws set forth by state and federal governments.
